website_summaries.verdict: A vitamin and mineral-packed charcoal mask that only requires a small amount to be effective.
pros: Goes on smooth and washes off easily
You get a lot of product for the money
cons: Some users have claimed it didn't work on their blackheads

customer_reviews.title: Just received and used this today and it is amazing! My face feels so fresh and clean
customer_reviews.text: Just received and used this today and it is amazing! My face feels so fresh and clean. I would recommend this to anyone I know if you're looking for a great mask.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Tackett

customer_reviews.title: Great for any type skin, including oily!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mask 3 times in 2 weeks and love it! It makes my face feel wonderful, has already removed some blackheads and makes my face feel soft without being greasy. It's definitely for any skin type!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: loved it
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a good mask containing charcoal for a long time. This is the best out of all ones of tried by far! the smell is totally mild, (unlike the others which smell tends to be harsh) and my sensitive skin reacts really well to it. definitely see a difference to my skin. love the branding too. glad i found this company and this product.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Most charcoal face masks leave my face dry by this ...
customer_reviews.text: Most charcoal face masks leave my face dry by this one didn't. Also, I have some pores on my nose and this definitely made it smaller after the first use. I would definitely purchase this mask again.
customer_reviews.author: juda

customer_reviews.title: This product is not the same
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this product in the past, and it was great! Unfortunately, my latest order of this product gave me a different experience: I noticed that the product is now much more watery (I can only assume that the makers of this product added more water and less of the charcoal to save money), and the smell is much more fishy. Also, the amount in the jar is less. When I use this mask now, I can't see the difference between before and after washing it off my face. I wouldn't recommend this charcoal mud mask unless the makers go back to their primitive ways.
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Good clean mud. Fun to use & great results.
customer_reviews.text: This mask was cooling and cleansing and it felt amazing on our faces. The applicator brush felt soft and it was a really different and fun way to apply the product. It felt more spa-like. The smell wasn’t the best but it was all natural and it works. That’s what I’m looking for in any product. Our faces felt clean and smooth and soft after the application and recommended wait time. The mask didn’t pull or crack and it wasn’t drying at all. It was even fun to wash off.
customer_reviews.author: Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cleansing
customer_reviews.text: Use it constantly. Has been a lifesaver for my skin. Pulls the impurity’s to the surface and out. If I get a breakout i do it every night until thw breakout clears. My skin has less scaring and more moisture. Less oil.
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this mask twice. I have sensitive skin and it hasn’t caused any reaction. I’m hoping it will help fade some of my dark spots over time. The only issue I have with it is the smell. It smells pretty strong and is almost sickening. However, once I’ve had it on for a few minutes I get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Casey H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My girls love this face mask.but just a note it is not a peel off mask. They both told me that there face feels smooth and fresh after using this mask and that it did help a little with blackheads.maybe over time and and the more you use it the better. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F

customer_reviews.title: Easy apply and take off. No irritation or terrible smell
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! There is no horrible smell, only a slight tingle as it works on your skin for maybe a minute at first application. Upon taking it off, was really easy and not at all painful like the peel masks. Before and after pics posted, no irritation of skin. Definitely will buy kore when needed and recommending everyone to buy it. It truly works amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a lot of black heads he works in the kitchen and with all the heat and oil and sweat makes his face really oily we used it for his face and it took a lot of them off leaving his face clear. Just wish it was a little thicker
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Hard to apply evenly!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't apply evenly using included brush or my fingertip or a makeup brush. It does not peel off, but it was my fault that I didnt read it before ordering. Very easy to remove. Skin feels fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do anything
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't really do anything. It dries out like other charcoal masks but doesn't actually do anything. I've used other charcoal masks that deep clean and are FAR superior to this one. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Meisner

customer_reviews.title: I loved it
customer_reviews.text: I received product yesterday,my daughter and i decided to have girls night and applied mask ,it was easy to open ,it has jar like packaging. I was scepticical due I have sensitive skin but decided to try it out .We applied mask with a brush ,left it on for about hour and then washed with soap and water ,my face is glowing today and I already got compliments on it so yes I would definitely recommend it and would buy it again . Thank you .
customer_reviews.author: Edita Ferhatovic

customer_reviews.title: Stings
customer_reviews.text: I loved the packaging of this item and the brush that came with! It was sealed up great. My only complaint is that the mask has such a strong smell to it, it also kinda burns right when you first put it on. Other than that I would say this is a good mask for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy Prebb

customer_reviews.title: Nice mask, cleans well
customer_reviews.text: This mask feels nice on the skin, isn't heard to remove and leaves my face very clean. I didn't see any radical results using it but I wasn't expecting too much. Overall a nice mask :)
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Seligmann

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work well, but I'm not 100% sure if it's doing anything real noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Bolton

customer_reviews.title: This is the best face mask I've found for clogged pores and blackheads
customer_reviews.text: This is the best face mask I've found for clogged pores and blackheads. I can't use it on my whole face, because it seems to really suck everything out of my skin. I've started using this in my highest oil areas and using a gentler mask on the rest of my face. I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Katy Creech

customer_reviews.title: Face feels so soft after use!
customer_reviews.text: I loved how soft my face felt after using this mask. It felt nice while being applied as well. I will continue to purchase this as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L

customer_reviews.title: Hum?
customer_reviews.text: Not really a mask? I Expected to be able to pull it off but it does not solidify? Hum?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mud went on easily and felt great
customer_reviews.text: Mud went on easily and felt great. I use a charcoal face wash in my shower and this has been a great mask to go along with it! Smells nice and washed off great when time was up.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Baker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff actually works for shrinking pores..i would have never believed it but it works!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Everything is good
customer_reviews.text: It works but it takes a little bit long to dry
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not harsh on skin
customer_reviews.text: I like this mask . Leaves the skin super soft without irritation
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: It is super easy to apply and wash off later
customer_reviews.text: It definitely feels refreshing! It is super easy to apply and wash off later. It moisturizes my face. I usually use it after I take a shower when my face is clean.
customer_reviews.author: Elif Ersahin

customer_reviews.title: Not a mud mask
customer_reviews.text: This is not a mud mask. There is no clay in the product. Second ingredient is alcohol. My face breaks out in cystic acne after use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED!!
customer_reviews.text: I was really nervous to try this product since my skin has been really crazy after having my son. It is AMAZING!! My skin feels so soft, I finally have that “glow” again!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible
customer_reviews.text: Smells horrible and doesn't do anything for the skin. (I have used this product for at least a month before this review)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: It went on easily with a make up brush I had and comes ...
customer_reviews.text: It went on easily with a make up brush I had and comes off with no problem. I really do not see any difference in my skin. But i have not had any reactions to it so I will continue to use it for now. Had no problem with shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this a few days ago and so far so good! Although mine didn’t come with the brush, it is just fine putting it on with my hands. My face feels great during and after, and my daughters love that I look so crazy! I will keep using and see how well it helps with my break outs, but I can already feel it cleansing and doing what it says it will.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie Moulton

customer_reviews.title: Great mask!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask! My coworker recommended I try it, and I’m so glad she did! It tightens pores without leaving my skin overly dry. During summer I used it 2x per week - winter only once.
customer_reviews.author: Emily W.

customer_reviews.title: It works !!
customer_reviews.text: I love the face mask . My skins looks perfect and brighter after use .
customer_reviews.author: Priyanka Chand

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Messy and doesn't pull out dirt and clean pores Like I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Natural amazing
customer_reviews.text: First off no parabens, no crap ingredients It’s natural it’s not tested on animals And it’s priced affordable I’ve been using this everyday since I’ve gotten it It’s super nice goes on well it’s making my skin better which is what i need most It smells good too ! And everything ingredient wise is perfect If you’re looking for a good mud mask without crap in it this is it And it’s priced so well! Will definitely be buying again and ordering from this company more
customer_reviews.author: Talia M.

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: I don’t what this was supposed to do but it’s WORTHLESS
customer_reviews.author: Swavey Ange

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Felt clean after use, but thought it was the pull off kind of charcoal
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: it's my first time using this product, and its great! good ingredients, its easy to wash off, and leaves my face glowing, love it :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I did not feel a difference in my face. Tried it multiple times. :(
customer_reviews.author: Dette

customer_reviews.title: Changed packaging... cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I can’t rate this product on whether it works or not bc I’m a little irritated by the fact that they changed the package and it is all wonky and cheap looking. It has a plastic top instead of the silver top... of its a good product that’s fine but I buy things also for the aesthetic purposes bc they can be both. It’s called beauty care. I saw someone else got the same bottle as me and their review was done in 2018 as opposed to the other 2017 reviews. This stuff better be good!
customer_reviews.author: LindsayBZ

customer_reviews.title: I don't know about the bottom layer but I didn't mask for over a month and finally did so last night with great results using this mask
customer_reviews.text: It gets rid of your top layer blackheads. I don't know about the bottom layer but I didn't mask for over a month and finally did so last night with great results using this mask. The relatively large pores on my nose looked clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tanna

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent facial product I kept it a longer then usual, and it helped clear impurities on my face. Over all excellent excellent product. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: i ended up returning this as I thought it was ...
customer_reviews.text: i ended up returning this as I thought it was a mask. Just seemed really messy and I didn't care for it.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: It feels like mud, and Amazon won’t let me return the ...
customer_reviews.text: This charcoal mask doesn’t harden. It feels like mud, and Amazon won’t let me return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Weiss

customer_reviews.title: ... very special I've gotten other brand charcoal masks with better results.
customer_reviews.text: Its not very special I've gotten other brand charcoal masks with better results.
customer_reviews.author: Exquisite Bullys

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: The product I received is NOT similar to the one advertised. It came in a plain can, no name, no ingredients, no nothing. For what I know this could be mud from someone’s backyard or a sewer.
customer_reviews.author: Javier O.

customer_reviews.title: Effective and cruelty-free
customer_reviews.text: I needed a charcoal mask to replace Boscia's, now that they are not cruelty-free. My face has been oily this hot, humid summer. Though I found this product on Amazon, I like that it is a local (to me) company. The product itself seems to be working really well--a few times a week keeps the pores/oil under control. The product is thinner than others I have used, so the included brush is much appreciated. All-around winner of a product.
customer_reviews.author: IShopHereTooMuch

customer_reviews.title: I love the mud mask but the brush left me wanting
customer_reviews.text: I like the mask. It works well and my skin both looks and feels great. The only reason I’m giving this 4 stars instead of 5 is because the brush that came with this is no where near the quality of the brush in the photo. The brush I received looks like a reject from a dollar store multi brush pack. It has a hard plastic support in the middle of the bristles that render it useless for applying product.
customer_reviews.author: pampered punkin

customer_reviews.title: Watery, no brush included.
customer_reviews.text: This mask is odd. Very watery, not the consistency of any mud or clay mask I’ve used before. This product also left black charcoal in my pores even after using a washcloth to get the excess off! Brush wasn’t included as described. Very disappointed and will be returning. I’m going back to another charcoal mask I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R. Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know yet if this has improved the quality of my skin, but I love this charcoal mask so far. My pores feel cleaner when I rinse it off, and it leaves a nice tingly feeling (but not burning - I have very sensitive skin and this does not irritate my skin at all).
customer_reviews.author: ECA

customer_reviews.title: returned
customer_reviews.text: The product applied nicely, and I could not detect an odor. I returned the product because my face felt even more oily after I removed the product. It most likely was my body chemistry and not the product, but I returned it non the less/
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Refresh your skin. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. I use it twice or once pet week. I am a African american woman and my face looks so healthy. My makeup going on so beautiful. After use of the charcoal use lotion to prevent the dryness. I use coco lotion on my face. In between i use the Charcoal soap for my face and body. Love it
customer_reviews.author: MARGARET D. SYDNOR

customer_reviews.title: First time using this mask and I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: First time using this mask and I absolutely love it!! So easy to put on, love mud based masks, and it feels so good on my skin. Gets rid of redness and over night makes acne disappear. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kat C.

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want to smell like flounder
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting. Smells like I smeared fish all over my face. The stench is so bad I can’t even wait for it to fully dry before washing it off. WTH? Awful. Went in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. It took care of ALL my blackheads and there were plenty. It left my skin soft and clean. I am impressed by it’s blackhead removal power.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Often times when I use face masks they leave my face super dry, but this mask did not! This mask is easy to put on and washes off easily, and even after the first use my pores were much smaller! Now I've used it a few more times and this mask has got rid of many of my black heads, and I've noticed that my skin is less oily overall
customer_reviews.author: Kaisab

customer_reviews.title: works as expected, and great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This mask is amazing. I have sensitive skin and it caused no irritation. It made my skin very soft, and actually shank pores. it also helps control oily skin. I love it. I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Nat Romanoff

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: This mask feels very cool and refreshing on my face! not harsh. My skin is noticeably smoother after use and it helps clear up any blemishes/pimples.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane Bernath

customer_reviews.title: But I guess I should've read the uses better.
customer_reviews.text: Was a little disappointing as I thought it was a peel off mask type thing but it isn't. But I guess I should've read the uses better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 🌚
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like using creams much and this mask is keeping my skin moisturizered and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels soft and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for evening out skin tones and removing blackheads
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Wulf

customer_reviews.title: love It! ❤
customer_reviews.text: It feels really soft and clean since you use it.. love It! ❤
customer_reviews.author: Yaneira

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This mask is the best I have used in US
customer_reviews.author: CaichanFeng

customer_reviews.title: Will stain with no benefit
customer_reviews.text: This is horrible as it stain your skin and anything else it touches. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Mango

product_meta.title: Brooklyn Botany - Activated Charcoal Mud Mask + Facial Brush - Facial Mask For Deep Cleansing Exfoliation - Best for Shrinking Pores, Black Head Remover & Blackhead Mask - 8.8 fl oz
feature_bullets: No. 1 SAFEST + MOST EFFECTIVE CHARCOAL MASK: An essential in every skincare regime, one you can depend on to soothe, nourish, hydrate, and deeply heal your skin whether you’re oily, dry, or somewhere in-between.
ACTIVATED CHARCOAL FACE MASK: Works like a magnet to clear skin of any impurities. Perfect for black head removal, leaving your skin clear and glowing.
BONUS FACIAL BRUSH - We have included a Facial Brush for easier application of the Mud Mask, so you can have a full spa package at home!

FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Packed with organic oils and other skin-boosting ingredients, such as hyaluronic acid and organic aloe leaf juice. Contains bentonite clay to gently remove any environmental toxins and act as a deep cleaning blackhead mask
MADE IN USA. Our Activated Charcoal Face Mask is paraben-free and cruelty-free.
